ARABIC: تِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِى نُورِثُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is the Garden which We will bequeath to those of Our slaves who have taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is the Paradise those of Our creatures will inherit who take heed and fear the displeasure of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Such is the Paradise which We shall cause those of Our servants who have been God-fearing to inherit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Such are the gardens which We will give to Our God-fearing servants as their inherited property.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is the Paradise that We will bequeath to those among Our bondmen who remain pious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Such is the Paradise which We shall give as an inheritance to those of Our servants who had Taqwa.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is the garden which We cause those of Our servants to inherit who guard (against evil).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: That is Paradise which We shall give as an inheritance to those of Our servants who are godfearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Such is the Garden which We cause the devout among Our bondmen to inherit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: That is the Garden which We will grant to those of Our servants who have been God-fearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Such is the Garden which We shall cause those of Our bondmen to inherit who have been God-fearing. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is the paradise We will give as inheritance to those of Our servants who are Godwary.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Such is the Garden which We give as an inheritance to those of Our servants who guard against Evil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Such is the Paradise which We shall give as an inheritance to those of Our slaves who have been Al-Muttaqun (pious and righteous persons - See V. 2:2).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: That is the Paradise which We shall give the cautious worshipers to inherit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Such is Paradise which We will give as inheritance to those of Our servants who are devout.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That is Paradise, which We give as inheritance to those of Our servants who were fearing of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:63] That is the Paradise which We shall give as inheritance, [which] We shall grant and [in which] We shall lodge, those of Our servants who are God-fearing, through [their] obedience of Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Such is the Garden which We cause the devout among Our bondmen) those who ward off disbelief and idolatry; and it is also said that this means: the one who obeys his Lord (to inherit) to dwell in.
